welcome_message_body: "Welcome to McKeesport, the charming city known for its rich history and picturesque views. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Allegheny County Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westmoreland County Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Westmoreland County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
